97372.name: Rate of violent deaths in conflicts and one-sided violence (per 100,000)
97372.description: Deaths per 100,000 of world population. Only conflicts (or one-sided violence) that resulted in more than 25 deaths are included. Deaths due to disease or famine caused by conflict, as well as extra-judicial killings in custody, are excluded.
97372.datasetName: Global battle-related and 'one-sided violence' deaths since 1946 â€“ PRIO/UCDP

source.name: UCDP/PRIO
source.dataPublishedBy: Uppsala Conflict Data Program (UCDP) & Peace Research Institute Oslo (PRIO)
source.additionalInfo: For the PRIO data, a full list of sources is available at www.prio.org/Data/Armed-Conflict. For the small number of conflicts which are ascribed two different conflict types, we have apportioned the death count evenly between the two.
